Name: Mary
description:
Mary is a widow from Nakayombe in Bududa. She has 4 children and operates a small textile shop in Bududa town alongside farming for increased cash inflows.

Mary is a hardworking woman who believes in reinvestment and business growth to earn more income. She is seeking a loan to add working capital to both of her businesses.

She will buy manure to boost crop growth and buy more fabrics of cotton, linen, silk, and chiffon to sell and earn more income for survival.

She is hopeful that her businesses will see her children through.
